1.10.name: wordpress/clicktale
1.10.description:
This is a plugin for self hosted Wordpress blogs. This plugin allows easy addition and change of the ClickTale script.
It also automatically tags the recordings based on actions a user makes.
These actions are:

  • Searches using the "Search" button.
  • Additions of comments.
  • Clicks on the RSS or Comments-RSS link.


This plugin has been tested on all versions of Wordpress up to 3.6. It will probably work on all versions, if you find it not compatible with your version of wordpress, please let us know about it.
Please, send comments, bugs, feature requests and ideas for new auto-tags through the ClickTale forum.
If you do not have a wordpresss blog, you can get one from http://www.wordpress.org
